form.label: File Integrity Monitoring
form.description: Track file and registry changes across Linux and Windows systems

search.query: (index=linux sourcetype=webfim host=$host_filter$ "FILE ") OR (index=windows sourcetype="WinEventLog:Sysmon" EventCode=11 host=$host_filter$) | stats count
index=windows sourcetype="WinEventLog:Sysmon" EventCode=11 host=$host_filter$ | stats count
index=windows sourcetype="WinEventLog:Sysmon" EventCode IN (12, 13) host=$host_filter$ | stats count

(index=linux sourcetype=webfim host=$host_filter$ "FILE ") OR (index=windows sourcetype="WinEventLog:Sysmon" EventCode IN (11, 12, 13) host=$host_filter$) OR (index=linux sourcetype="linux:audit" host=$host_filter$ type=SYSCALL) | stats dc(host) as count

(index=linux sourcetype=webfim host=$host_filter$ "FILE ") OR (index=windows sourcetype="WinEventLog:Sysmon" EventCode=11 host=$host_filter$) OR (index=windows sourcetype="WinEventLog:Sysmon" EventCode IN (12, 13) host=$host_filter$) OR (index=linux sourcetype="linux:audit" host=$host_filter$ type=SYSCALL) | eval source_label=case( sourcetype=="webfim", "WebFIM", sourcetype=="WinEventLog:Sysmon" AND EventCode==11, "Sysmon File", sourcetype=="WinEventLog:Sysmon" AND EventCode IN (12, 13), "Sysmon Registry", sourcetype=="linux:audit", "Audit", 1=1, sourcetype ) | timechart span=5m count by source_label

(index=linux sourcetype=webfim host=$host_filter$ "FILE ") OR (index=windows sourcetype="WinEventLog:Sysmon" EventCode IN (11, 12, 13) host=$host_filter$) OR (index=linux sourcetype="linux:audit" host=$host_filter$ type=SYSCALL) | stats count by host | sort -count | head 15

(index=linux sourcetype=webfim host=$host_filter$ "FILE ") OR (index=linux sourcetype="linux:audit" host=$host_filter$ type=PATH name=*) OR (index=linux sourcetype=linux_secure host=$host_filter$ ("passwd" OR "shadow" OR "sudoers" OR "authorized_keys")) | eval file_path=case( sourcetype=="webfim", coalesce(file_path, mvindex(split(_raw, ": "), -1)), sourcetype=="linux:audit", name, sourcetype=="linux_secure", _raw, 1=1, null() ) | rex field=_raw "FILE (?<change_type>\w+):\s+(?<fim_path>\S+)" | eval file_path=coalesce(fim_path, file_path) | rex field=_raw "FILE \w+:\s+\S+\s+\(old=(?<old_hash>\w+)\s+new=(?<new_hash>\w+)\)" | eval change_type=case( isnotnull(change_type), change_type, sourcetype=="linux:audit" AND syscall IN ("open", "openat", "creat"), "ACCESS/CREATE", sourcetype=="linux:audit" AND syscall IN ("unlink", "unlinkat"), "DELETE", sourcetype=="linux:audit" AND syscall IN ("rename", "renameat"), "RENAME", sourcetype=="linux:audit" AND syscall IN ("chmod", "fchmod", "chown", "fchown"), "PERMISSION", sourcetype=="linux:audit" AND syscall IN ("write", "pwrite64"), "WRITE", sourcetype=="linux_secure", "REFERENCE", 1=1, "CHANGE" ) | where isnotnull(file_path) AND file_path!="" | eval category=case( match(file_path, "^/(usr/)?(s?bin)/"), "System Binaries", match(file_path, "^/etc/(passwd|shadow|group|sudoers)") OR match(file_path, "^/etc/pam\.d/"), "Auth Files", match(file_path, "^/etc/ssh/") OR match(file_path, "authorized_keys") OR match(file_path, "\.ssh/config"), "SSH Config", match(file_path, "^/etc/cron") OR match(file_path, "^/var/spool/cron") OR match(file_path, "^/etc/systemd/system/"), "Cron/Systemd", match(file_path, "^/boot/") OR match(file_path, "^/etc/modules") OR match(file_path, "^/etc/modprobe"), "Boot/Kernel", match(file_path, "^/etc/resolv\.conf") OR match(file_path, "^/etc/hosts$") OR match(file_path, "^/etc/network/") OR match(file_path, "^/etc/sysconfig/network"), "Network Config", sourcetype=="webfim", "Web Root", 1=1, "Other" ) | eval details=case( isnotnull(old_hash) AND isnotnull(new_hash), "old=" . old_hash . " new=" . new_hash, sourcetype=="linux:audit", "syscall=" . syscall . " exe=" . exe, 1=1, substr(_raw, 1, 150) ) | table _time, host, category, file_path, change_type, details | sort -_time | rename category as "Category", file_path as "File Path", change_type as "Change Type", details as "Details" | head 50

index=linux sourcetype=webfim host=$host_filter$ "FILE " | rex field=_raw "FILE (?<change_type>\w+):\s+(?<file_path>\S+)" | rex field=_raw "\(old=(?<old_hash>\w+)\s+new=(?<new_hash>\w+)\)" | eval detail=case( isnotnull(old_hash), change_type . " (old=" . old_hash . " new=" . new_hash . ")", isnotnull(change_type), change_type, 1=1, substr(_raw, 1, 150) ) | table _time, host, file_path, detail | sort -_time | rename file_path as "File Path", detail as "Change Detail" | head 30

index=linux sourcetype=webfim host=$host_filter$ "FILE " | rex field=_raw "FILE (?<change_type>\w+):\s+(?<file_path>\S+)" | where match(file_path, "\.(php|jsp|aspx|py|pl|cgi|sh|phtml|php[345]|phar|war)$") | eval severity="CRITICAL" | eval detail=case( change_type=="ADDED", "NEW FILE - Possible Webshell", change_type=="MODIFIED", "MODIFIED - Check for injection", change_type=="REMOVED", "REMOVED", 1=1, change_type ) | table _time, host, severity, file_path, change_type, detail | sort -_time | rename severity as "Severity", file_path as "File Path", change_type as "Change Type", detail as "Assessment" | head 20

index=windows sourcetype="WinEventLog:Sysmon" EventCode=11 host=$host_filter$ | search TargetFilename IN ("*\\Windows\\System32\\*", "*\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\*", "*\\Start Menu\\Programs\\Startup\\*", "*\\Windows\\System32\\Tasks\\*", "*\\SYSVOL\\*") | eval category=case( match(TargetFilename, "(?i)System32\\\\Tasks"), "Scheduled Tasks", match(TargetFilename, "(?i)System32|SysWOW64"), "System Directory", match(TargetFilename, "(?i)Startup"), "Startup Folder", match(TargetFilename, "(?i)SYSVOL"), "Group Policy", 1=1, "Other" ) | table _time, host, category, TargetFilename, Image, User | sort -_time | rename category as "Category", TargetFilename as "Target File", Image as "Creating Process" | head 30

index=windows sourcetype="WinEventLog:Sysmon" EventCode=11 host=$host_filter$ | search TargetFilename IN ("*.exe", "*.dll", "*.bat", "*.cmd", "*.ps1", "*.vbs", "*.js", "*.hta", "*.scr") | eval severity=case( match(TargetFilename, "(?i)\.(exe|dll|scr)$"), "HIGH", match(TargetFilename, "(?i)\.(ps1|vbs|hta)$"), "HIGH", match(TargetFilename, "(?i)\.(bat|cmd|js)$"), "MEDIUM", 1=1, "MEDIUM" ) | table _time, host, severity, TargetFilename, Image, User | sort -_time | rename severity as "Severity", TargetFilename as "Target File", Image as "Creating Process" | head 30

index=windows sourcetype="WinEventLog:Sysmon" EventCode IN (12, 13) host=$host_filter$ | eval category=case( match(TargetObject, "(?i)\\\\CurrentVersion\\\\Run") OR match(TargetObject, "(?i)\\\\RunOnce"), "Autorun", match(TargetObject, "(?i)\\\\Services\\\\"), "Services", match(TargetObject, "(?i)Image File Execution Options"), "Image Hijack", match(TargetObject, "(?i)\\\\Winlogon\\\\"), "Winlogon", match(TargetObject, "(?i)KnownDLLs"), "Known DLLs", match(TargetObject, "(?i)\\\\Policies\\\\") OR match(TargetObject, "(?i)SecurityProviders"), "Security", match(TargetObject, "(?i)Schedule\\\\TaskCache"), "Scheduled Tasks", 1=1, "Other" ) | eval event_type=case( EventCode==12, "Create/Delete", EventCode==13, "Value Set", 1=1, "Unknown" ) | table _time, host, category, event_type, TargetObject, Details, Image | sort -_time | rename category as "Category", event_type as "Event Type", TargetObject as "Registry Key", Details as "Value", Image as "Process" | head 50

(index=linux sourcetype=webfim host=$host_filter$ "FILE " "*$path_filter$*") OR (index=windows sourcetype="WinEventLog:Sysmon" EventCode IN (11, 2) host=$host_filter$ TargetFilename="*$path_filter$*") OR (index=linux sourcetype="linux:audit" host=$host_filter$ name="*$path_filter$*") OR (index=linux sourcetype=linux_secure host=$host_filter$ "*$path_filter$*") | eval source_label=case( sourcetype=="webfim", "WebFIM", sourcetype=="WinEventLog:Sysmon", "Sysmon", sourcetype=="linux:audit", "Audit", sourcetype=="linux_secure", "Secure Log", 1=1, sourcetype ) | rex field=_raw "FILE (?<change_type_w>\w+):\s+(?<file_path_w>\S+)" | eval file_path=case( sourcetype=="webfim", file_path_w, sourcetype=="WinEventLog:Sysmon", TargetFilename, sourcetype=="linux:audit", name, 1=1, null() ) | eval change_type=case( sourcetype=="webfim", change_type_w, sourcetype=="WinEventLog:Sysmon" AND EventCode==11, "FileCreate", sourcetype=="WinEventLog:Sysmon" AND EventCode==2, "TimeChanged", sourcetype=="linux:audit", syscall, sourcetype=="linux_secure", "Reference", 1=1, "Unknown" ) | eval details=case( sourcetype=="webfim", _raw, sourcetype=="WinEventLog:Sysmon", "Process=" . Image . " User=" . User, sourcetype=="linux:audit", "exe=" . exe . " uid=" . uid, 1=1, substr(_raw, 1, 200) ) | table _time, host, source_label, file_path, change_type, details | sort +_time | rename source_label as "Source", file_path as "File Path", change_type as "Change Type", details as "Details" | head 100

(index=linux sourcetype=webfim host=$host_filter$ "FILE ") OR (index=windows sourcetype="WinEventLog:Sysmon" EventCode IN (11, 12, 13) host=$host_filter$) OR (index=linux sourcetype="linux:audit" host=$host_filter$ type=SYSCALL) OR (index=linux sourcetype=linux_secure host=$host_filter$ ("Accepted" OR "Failed password")) OR (index=windows sourcetype="WinEventLog:Security" EventCode IN (4624, 4625) host=$host_filter$) | eval event_category=case( sourcetype=="webfim", "FIM", sourcetype=="WinEventLog:Sysmon" AND EventCode IN (11, 12, 13), "FIM", sourcetype=="linux:audit" AND type=="SYSCALL", "FIM", sourcetype=="linux_secure" AND match(_raw, "Accepted"), "Auth Success", sourcetype=="linux_secure" AND match(_raw, "Failed"), "Auth Failure", sourcetype=="WinEventLog:Security" AND EventCode==4624, "Auth Success", sourcetype=="WinEventLog:Security" AND EventCode==4625, "Auth Failure", 1=1, "Other" ) | where event_category!="Other" | timechart span=1m count by event_category
